attributes.action: Additional bank holiday this year to celebrate Boris Johnson’s resignation.
attributes.additional_details: This will boost the economy and the moral of the country. We can then put this whole saga to bed.
attributes.background: Let us all give Boris a good old send off. We can all enjoy cheese, wine, cake.

rejection.details:
We think you're joking. 

In any case, we can't accept petitions calling for honours for specific individuals, including bank holidays.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
